awards:
第22届欧洲电影奖(2009)
　　最佳纪录片(提名) 彼得·克雷克斯
region: 斯洛伐克/捷克/奥地利/芬兰

director.name: 彼得·克雷克斯 Péter Kerekes

introduction: 通过采访多个欧洲军队的厨师，展示了军队用餐的制作方法，并通过采访，从特殊的角度，向观众描述了6场战争，和厨师对战争的贡献。A documentary film about army cooks and how the everyday needs of thousands of armed stomachs affect the victories and defeats of statesmen. About the field kitchen as a model of a world where food preparation becomes a fight strategy; a fight for great ideals standing on strong legs of the kitchen table.The film is based on eleven recipes of the cooks since the Second World War till the war in Tchechenia; from France through the Balkans to Russia.
